Name: Three life
About the game: Formal authorization, officially landing on the VR platform.In the game,the player can experience the novel story.The player can play the role of character like Baiqian and Susu.In the game,the palyer can use chinese magic and play with the characters.Discover the world and enjoy it. Now there are three scenes 1. Zhu Sendai 20 Li peach forest 3 Nirvana illusory The game is still developing and will gradually open up new levels.
